map.title: Our Global Presence
map.subtitle: From our Spanish groves to tables around the world

hero.title: Mikel's: Mediterranean Tradition, Global Reach
hero.subtitle: Artisanal fruits, natural juices, and award-winning oils from Spain, distributed to 15+ countries. Certified quality since 1819.

about.title: Our Heritage
about.subtitle: Five generations of dedication to authentic Mediterranean flavors, from the heart of Spain to the world
about.foundationDesc: Our family settles in Alcarr√†s, Catalonia, beginning a legacy of agricultural excellence that would span generations.
about.traditionDesc: Seven generations have maintained our commitment to quality, expanding from local markets to international presence.
about.recognitionDesc: Awards from Olive Japan, World's Best Olive Oils, and Eco Garden certification place us among the world's elite producers.
about.alcarrasDesc: Located in the world's leading stone fruits production region, our 400-hectare groves benefit from ideal Mediterranean climate and centuries of expertise. This is where our premium peaches, nectarines, and the unique Paraguayo are cultivated.
about.cordobaDesc: In the heart of Andalusia's olive country, we produce award-winning extra virgin olive oil that has earned international acclaim. Our organic production methods honor the land and deliver exceptional flavor.
about.goldAward: World's Best Olive Oils Gold Award

products.title: Our Premium Products
products.subtitle: From sun-ripened stone fruits to award-winning olive oil, every product embodies our commitment to Mediterranean authenticity

paraguayo.title: Paraguayo in Light Syrup
paraguayo.description: The flat peach that conquered our hearts over a century ago. Cultivated in Alcarr√†s, hand-selected, patiently cooked and lovingly jarred. World's only producer.
paraguayo.feature1: Handcrafted - Each jar made by hand

oliveOil.title: Extra Virgin Olive Oil
oliveOil.description: Award-winning organic olive oil from C√≥rdoba. Gold Medal winner at Olive Japan 2025 and World's Best Olive Oils 2022 & 2024. Three varieties: Arbequina, Picual, Hojiblanca.

temprano.title: Early Harvest Olive Oil
temprano.description: Not for everyone. And we love it. This early harvest oil, made from green olives, is intense, spicy, with a green fruitiness that explodes on the palate.

nectarina.title: Nectarine in Light Syrup
nectarina.description: The peach without complexes: smooth skin, intense flavor, defined character. Cultivated in Alcarr√†s with the same care as our Paraguayo.

juices.title: Mikel's Fruit Juices
juices.description: 100% natural NFC juices produced in Spain, with no additives or preservatives. Available in multiple Mediterranean flavors.

appleGolden.title: Golden Claudy Apple
appleGolden.description: Golden Claudy apple NFC juice from the Mediterranean basin. 200ml format.

orangeValencia.title: Valencia Orange
orangeValencia.description: Valencia orange NFC juice from the Mediterranean basin. 200ml format. QR code connects to Google Earth showing farm locations.

products.bulkDesc: All products available in bulk quantities for international distribution. We offer Mikel's branded products tailored to your market needs.

signature.title: Paraguayo - Our Signature Product
signature.description: Paraguayo, also known as flat peach or donut peach, is a unique variety with exceptional sweetness and delicate flavor. Mikel's is the only company in the world producing this specialty fruit in light syrup, making it an exclusive offering for discerning markets.
signature.handcraftedDesc: Each jar made by hand following traditional family methods
signature.quote: Made with the same care and dedication that our family has applied for over 200 years

quality.title: Quality & Certifications
quality.subtitle: Every product bearing the Mikel's name represents our unwavering dedication to quality, authenticity, and health
quality.veganDesc: 100% plant-based products suitable for vegan diets
quality.gmoFreeDesc: No genetically modified organisms in any product
quality.processDesc: Our commitment to maintaining detailed processing in each of our products for Mikel's Food and Healthy offerings, just as we have been doing since 1819. From field to jar, we maintain strict quality control at every step.
quality.globalGapDesc: International standard for Good Agricultural Practices
quality.ecoGardenDesc: Only 3 companies in Spain hold this certification

supplyChain.title: Global Supply Chain Excellence
supplyChain.subtitle: Efficient logistics and dedicated service ensure your products arrive in Asia, Europe and America
supplyChain.logisticsDesc: Efficient shipping to all major ports
supplyChain.partnershipDesc: Dedicated support for your business growth

partnership.title: Experts in Mediterranean Brand Distribution
partnership.subtitle: Farms Planet: Your Strategic Partner to Bring Spanish Brands to the World
partnership.partnershipDesc: Farms Planet is committed to supporting your success in Europe, Middle East (UAE), and Asia with authentic Spanish products, reliable supply, and exceptional service. Already present in Korea, Japan, and Taiwan.
partnership.ecommerceDesc: Your own Mikel's online store for your market

digitalPartnership.title: Your Complete Digital Solution
digitalPartnership.subtitle: As a Farms Planet distributor, you don't just receive premium products‚Äîyou get a turnkey e-commerce platform ready to sell in your market
digitalPartnership.feature1Desc: Fully functional e-commerce website with your local domain, language, and currency
digitalPartnership.feature2Desc: Complete catalog with professional photography, descriptions, and nutritional information
digitalPartnership.feature3Desc: Local payment methods and shipping options configured for your country
digitalPartnership.feature4Desc: SEO optimization, social media assets, and digital marketing materials
digitalPartnership.exampleDesc: Visit our Spanish market store to see the complete experience your customers will enjoy

contact.title: Start Your Distribution Partnership
contact.subtitle: Connect with our international sales team to discuss bulk orders and distribution opportunities for our brands
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your distribution needs, target market, estimated volumes, and any specific requirements...
contact.requestCatalog: Request full product catalog with bulk pricing
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your interest! We'll contact you soon.

footer.description: Distributor of premium Mediterranean brands with over 200 years of tradition. Your trusted partner for authentic Spanish excellence.
